name: Alicia Rogers
text: We had a wonderful experience! Our baseball team went for lunch between games. We let them know that we had time constraints and needed to get the boys fed fast. They recommended ordering several large pizzas that they could get out quickly. It worked like a charm! We were in and out in less than an hour and food was amazing too!

name: Lizbeth LiveByFaith
text: Nice place to come. Drinks were great. Atmosphere was nice. Dog friendly.

name: Latasha Wells
text: What a great company & management team. My teenage nephew worked here at the time of his passing recently. I called to see if they could accommodate us as a large group to gather after the funeral (Covid). Not only did they accommodate us, ‚Ä¶More

name: Heavyn Kennedy
text: I had my rehearsal dinner here and the staff took great care of us. We had 50 people and Danny and Cam took great care of us!!

name: Mark Aszman
text: One can never go wrong at the Mushroom as our family has always called it. The Cartersville location has had it's ups and downs, but it is truly a gem in the downtown area! It's definitely up as the ownership has gone from corporate to ‚Ä¶More

name: Michele McFarlane
text: The food here was yummy,  in accordance with the Mellow Mushroom standard. The service, however, was a completely different story. They were slow and just confused. For dine-in I will definitely travel to the Kennesaw location.

name: Ashlee Perone
text: The vegan pizza is really good. I asked for avocado on it however they didn't remember to it was coming out of the oven... Their solution was to put half an avocado in a takeout bowl

name: William Olson
text: Although a bit pricey, the pizzas are fantastic. If you want to sit at the bar and eat and drink, come on Fridays, and go to the upstairs bar. Bartender Heather will take care of you

name: Brittiny Kitchin
text: So 2 years ago when this mellow reopen my kids and I didn't like how everything was under cook and was awful so we haven't been back since. I am pleased to said that the food today was amazing... cook perfectly. I hope they will keep these cooks and not let them slip by.

name: Todd Souders
text: Always our go-to for pizza in town. It's a bit pricier than other places but it's worth it. Sometimes the crust is a little thick around the edge for my taste but that doesn't happen all the time. Make sure to start with the pretzel bites and beer cheese.

name: Joyce Myers
text: Food was really good. The problem I have is there's no warning to step up when going into the side dining area and having a bad knee, I could've seriously hurt myself if I hadn't looked down.

name: Mike Kuebler
text: Best pizza.  Great vibe.  Great beer selec.

name: James Henderson
text: Had a great time. The food was amazing and the waitress was very attentive and made some great suggestions.

name: Amber Mulhair
text: Loved loved the food üòç and everyone was so nice . your should go and see for your self üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª

name: Clay Waddell
text: Great food, service is usually also great. The frozen jack and cokes used to be amazing, but they reduced the amount of jack, so not anymore. The upstairs bar has great atmosphere.

name: Jewls George
text: Employees were nice. The place was extremely clean and it was a mega gnarly environment, overall. My order was 100% accurate and absolutely DELICIOUS. Hot and fresh, super tasty. I would've uploaded pics, but I already hulk smashed everything 10/10 would eat again üòãü§§

name: Carol Wood
text: I ordered a sandwich was not worth the price I paid for it. If you added chips it was $2 more n it was just a small bag of chips. My friend ordered pizza it was good.

name: Jack Ussery
text: Great place! Within walking distance of home!

name: Penny King
text: Good food. Great service. We had a very large birthday party, and food came out quickly, and everyone seed very satisfied. Appetizers were so good. The pizza was the best. The calzone was very tasty. I don't think you can go wrong no matter what you order.  Thank to the staff for a great evening.

name: Walter Presley
text: Food was good. Wait was short. And beer was cold

name: Misty King
text: Great bunch of folks! Awesome food.

name: Sarah Gregory
text: Love this mellow mushroom. Staff is great. Location is great. Kids love it.

name: Tyrek Adams
text: After years of awful service I am BEYOND flabbergasted this "restaurant" continues to stay in service.  Since the day their doors opened they have been unable to run this place properly. When they  mess up your order at lunch break, you ‚Ä¶More

text: We had a 50th birthday party here. Heavyn and Candace we awesome! Food was great, service was fantastic! Thank you so much! üòÄ

name: slomo yisreal
text: Good pizzas. Nice place too go for pizza

name: Charles Phillips
text: Great Pizza!  And a fun place!

name: BanditBeast 2176
text: Pizza is very good and the ceaser salad is very nice

name: Heather Hurley
text: This place gets better each time i come in!!

name: susie quinn
text: Great food ,downtown cartersville  and great atmosphere

name: J K
text: What a great place to eat!  The sandwiches,  pizza, salads, appetizer our group of 10 enjoyed was terrific!  The wait staff were attentive and friendly.  This restaurant is not a cheap place to eat,  so take enough funds to cover your meal. The veggie sandwich I had was around $8 without any sides included.

name: Cameron Shampine
text: Great pizza! Had a small one to myself, (I forget the name of it) with chicken, bacon, jalapenos, and a buffalo drizzle. It was great! The server was pretty slow to get us the check, and the pizza took a little longer than expected for lunch time with not too many people there. But overall a good experience.

name: Britney Lows
text: This past weekend we were in here.And right when we walked in the kids up front apparently did not know where or who our server was. Sat there for 15 minutes with no drink. When leaving my husband asked to see a manager and you think ‚Ä¶More

name: Ben Butler
text: Waited on hold for 9 minutes to tell me they don‚Äôt sell pizza slices. I know I‚Äôve ordered cheese pizza by the slice before. It was a delicious ‚Äò  delicieux  but no service to sir.

name: Alex Hough
text: This place has a balcony with a great view and a really good frozen Jack and Coke slushy. I ordered a Mighty Meaty pizza, and it was great. You won't go wrong stopping in here.

name: Bela Krusac
text: Great pizza and Corona Cleansed. Felt safe and friendly.

name: Anthony L
text: Great food; best pizza.  Friendly servers and a great atmosphere!

name: erica engele
text: Their salads are delicious! I love the build your own! The pizza is also good but I'm on a diet so no pizza for me.

name: Tina Grindstaff
text: Amazing food! Great selection.

name: Dorothy Rhodes
text: Large group if 25 had great service and food.

name: Jessica Deluca

name: Mark Estrada
text: Great place love the music and the people is so friendly  ,highly recommend

name: Kelly Davidson
text: Great food and atmosphere! Love downtown Cartersville!!

name: Julia Foster
text: The food is great and the server was amazing!!! The bathrooms we absolutely gross. There was no toilet paper in one of the stalls and only a few paper towels to even dry my hands with and the garbage was overflowing and I asked to speak with a manager but he or she never came to our table.

name: LuAnn Scott
text:
Usually love this place.  Something has changed
Wasn't up to the normal goodness. Also sat where I could see the guys making the pizza crust.  Both had scraggly beards. Need beard nets or be clean shaved. ‚Ä¶More

text: Pizza was pretty good but service was terrible and prices werr a little high for pizza

name: Charles Howard
text: Good food and pizza , service was excellent too

name: Alicia Simmons
text: This was my husband and I second time eating here.  Everything was great. Service and food. We got the Pacific Rim pizza. Really good.

name: James Youell
text: First time and we loved it. Great people and great service.  The pie crust was great.  We have not had a pizza this good scene South Dakota. To the staff Thank you. We will be back.

name: Jessica Fuqua
text: We were in town for a wedding and stopped at this location! Wonderful experience and great pizza! Enjoyed the waitress‚Äôs drink suggestion as well! We sat upstairs. Our server was phenomenal.

name: cheryl abbott
text: We had never tried Mellow Mushroom pizza before.  It was just fantastic!!

name: Joshua Anderson
text: Jenna was our server and we had a pretty sizable group. She and the staff were very professional, the food was fantastic, would definitely reccomend!

name: Jonathan Strickland
text: Our waiter and the host were so friendly! This place offers all the usual delicious menu items with its own awesome atmosphere. Interestingly, this little joint has two floors with bars both upstairs and downstairs. I recommend sitting up ‚Ä¶More

name: Srinidhi Naik
text: Good pizza.  We had the vegetarian pizza, which was cooked extra to be crispy upon our request. Also had the house and greek salads which were good too.  Recommend getting a small salad, though, as the regular size is too large a portion.  All in all, a good meal and option for hungry diners.

name: Erick Hohler
text: Very friendly staff and great food. I used to not like mellow mushroom but this one changed my mind. Very good pizza.

name: Emily Waters

text: We had a large group and Mellow Mushroom happily took us on and did a great job for us. Our waitress was incredible. Highly recommend this restaurant!

text: We got sat and 20 minutes went by before anyone offered us a drink or asked for our order. Servers clearly didn't care about providing a great customer service.

name: Jayla Cunning

text: Food and service were very good. I always enjoy my mellow mushroom in cartersville ga.

name: Jayson Henry
text: Always the best steak and cheese in town. If you haven't ever been to the Mellow you must make it on your to do list.. Never a disappointment. Always friendly staff and the food from salads to pizza is  out of this world...Thanks Mellow for making my stomach happyüòÅü§ó

text: This is a great place with a great atmosphere. And my server Amanda was really awesome. If you go there you have to request her.

name: zach breedlove
text: Best pizza you can get in the area. Delicious food all around, and excellent service. The atmosphere is great. The people who served our table were so nice and so helpful. Thank you mellow mushroom for providing such a wonderful experience

name: Chris Ponder
text: Great spot in downtown Cartersville!  Good service and i love mellow so the food and beer is always good along with the chill atmosphere.

name: Owen Bostic

name: SgBlackwolf 92
text: @mellowMushroom the food was delicious and the staff were very accommodating.

name: Tom Rittweger
text: Enjoyed the pizza, of course! Had a great server, Laura, I believe. We were having trouble deciding what to order and she recommended a half-and-half pizza. Worked out well for us. It was rather quiet so our service was quick. Nicely done!

name: Rebecca Murray
text: Lunch combo deal half hoagie (meatball hoagie was really good) with half salad and fountain drink only $10.00. The food was fresh and you could tell it was homemade not frozen.  Portions of hoagie and salad are very generous. Service was excellent as well.

name: Kasey Miller
text: This is the only place I ever get pizza from! Never disappointed, food is delicious and the restaurant is very clean.

name: Michael McKee
text: Great time! Great service! Flight of beer!

name: Brice Wood
text: Great food and service.  The only drawback is that they need more space for people to wait inside for a table during bad weather

name: Dee Bradley
text: The place was new when I went in. The service was getting used to being open. Good food. Great atmosphere

name: Jason Cowan
text: Kind of in a unique building in old town.  Great Pizza.

name: Lisa MarieSpeed
text: So much fun.  Love the atmosphere and the pizza.  Our favorite is the bbq chicken pizza yummy!! Staff is attentive and friendly!!

name: Bunny Woods
text: This was our first time visiting Mellow Mushroom. We had to wait a decent amount of time to be served when it wasn't busy at all. The waitress was amazing. She went above and beyond explaining the menu choices and etc. We got the spinach ‚Ä¶More

name: Troy Werner
text: Every trip, we hit

name: Sue Lundon
text: I just left from Mellow mushroom and the down bar was not good at all I asked for recommendations and she couldn‚Äôt give me any good it was like she was busy talking to a coworker I felt like I was bothering her .The upstairs bar I would recommend super friendly and nice.

name: Ken McGarity
text: Food was great as always - location decor could stand to be updated and greeting staff was not engaging upon arrival.

name: Noah Pritchett
text: Since the new ownership this place has certainly improved! If you're in the area be sure to give it a try! Derrick was our bartender and he was super knowledgeable and took great care of us!

name: Ken McGarity
text: Great visit with family - good service and great food

name: Leonard Culberson
text: Great place to meet friends, family , have parties, gatherings! Friendly accommodating staff!

name: Jeffrey Crockett
text: Best manager ever! Very kind, welcoming, and professional. Food, ambiance exceptional.

name: Lauren Reynolds
text: Since the Mellow Mushroom in Cartersville reopened, they have greatly stepped up their game. There has always been exceptional service with friendly staff. The food arrives quickly and while it is still hot. Never had a bad experience here since the reopening. I highly recommend eating here.

name: Lyn Province
text: Awesome service. Pizza dough has great taste. Wide variety of food items to choose from and prices are worth every bite.

name: Alex McCarthy
text: Had a decent selection of beers to try out, nothing really out of the ordinary. The food was pretty good, but again, nothing out of the ordinary. The service was... Meh.

name: Jonathan Howell
text: Super nice place, great food - I wish they still had the mural

name: Lillie Read
text: The Holy Shiitake pizza is AMAZING!  I also love the spinach salad.  This place is large enough for groups and I recently hosted an event here for nearly 80 people, which they handled like pros.

name: Mike Jenkins
text: Pizza is great, has a sweeter pizza sauce. Atmosphere is fun for large groups.

name: Jodie
text: Great food and service.

name: Craig Perry
text: Good stop, though not close to expressway.  Pizza was great.  Ordered cheese bread, salad and large pizza for family of six.  Finished all and everyone happy.  About $30 with tip.

name: Luz Javalera
text: The pizza is the bomb. Thin crust is the best. The cheese was fresh and it's no wonder why Mr. Mellow is famous, mushrooms were delicious. I was really excited to taste the mushroom soup but, I was disappointed. Too, too salty.

name: Stephanie Skiffen
text:
Wonderful pizza. Excellent selection. Fabulous Service. Very Family Friendly.

My husband and I were having trouble deciding what pizza to ordered and our ‚Ä¶More

text: Meatball trio was amazing, and so was the pacific rim pizza

name: Jessica Dailey
text: The food was good and the server was very sweet.

name: Charlotte Barton
text: Had really good service, but this place doesn't have the same feeling it once had when it was first opened.

name: Adam H
text: All mellow mushrooms taste the same. Usually very bland. You have to dump lots of red pepper on everything to give it a kick. And what‚Äôs with the dough. It‚Äôs just different and not in a good way. All the food looks great but then fails to deliver. Always good service though.

name: P B
text: Holy shitake pizza is the absolute best! Always great service and atmosphere

name: John Treadwell
text: Good steak calzone. It was big enough for two people.  Waiter was very good.

name: Margaret Roth Shearon
text: Was in their upstairs room for a networking event.  They served plenty of good pizza selections and salad for the group.  An excellent choice for meetings!

name: Thomas Blankinship
text: Good pizza. Enjoyable atmosphere.

name: Tona Morgan
text: Awesome pizza and great service! If you visit downtown Cartersville, GA be sure to drop by for a great meal!

name: John Sullivan
text: Normally, I would give MM at least four stars. This last visit will be my last for a while. The service was awful. Drinks were wrong, and never refilled. They forgot the appetizer and the pizza was an hour getting to us, yet somehow still cold. Skip this until they are better managed.

name: Ethan Reeves
text: The pizza is great I honestly hate going to restaurants but going to Mellow Mushroom is like going to heaven

name: Greg Tunnell
text: Best Mellow have been to since leaving Florida

name: Rachael Lancieri
text: Great service & food! Sat at the bar downstairs, & the bartender was amazing. I forgot her name... she has broken hair, & she's so friendly. Great vibe in there.

name: Breanna Blankenship
text: We haven't been here in a while, bit the service and food is always great. If you have a dog it is great to walk downtown with them, and stop here for a snack, lunch, or dinner. If you ask they will give you some water for your pup and you can eat in their outdoor area with your pup.  I kind of miss the retro purple coloring tho!

text: Love the NEW Mellow Mushroom! The new managers and staff are all amazing! I‚Äôve had the best service and pizza I‚Äôve ever had at this location since the recent change of ownership. Thank you for making my girlfriends birthday awesome!

name: J Laz

name: Mike D
text: Pizza was excellent. Cheese bread and wings were good

name: Jeremy May
text: Very overpriced dough, food is bar food qaulity but not the 75 dollar check I got for two pizzas and an appetizer. Service is very bad at this location also which is local, as I've had great service at other MM locations.

name: Juli Dykes
text: Service was good and the pizza came out timely and hot, also, the pizza itself was delicious, my only complaint ~ there just was not enough cheese and toppings, def could add more and would probably rate 5 stars.

text: Mellow Mushroom is awesome pizza, unfortunately it's also exspensive pizza. I'm not sure the cost out weighted the taste and service. Out of the three times we have eaten at this location, service has been good, but really slow. Over all, if you wanna spend some dough (pun intended), this is a good place for a slice or a beer.
